title: Smart Data Models - WindPlantDynamics
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Parent class supporting relationships to wind turbines Type 3 and 4 and wind plant IEC and user defined wind plants including their control models.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindPlantDynamics

RemoteInputSignal.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The wind plant using the remote signal. Default: None

WindTurbineType3or4Dynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The wind turbine type 3 or 4 associated with this wind plant. Default: 'list'
